verses.name: Leviticus 19:31
verses.text: Regard not them that have familiar spirits, neither seek after wizards, to be defiled by them: I am the Lord your God.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:32
verses.text: Thou shalt rise up before the hoary head, and honour the face of the old man, and fear thy God: I am the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:33
verses.text: And if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land, ye shall not vex him.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:34
verses.text: But the stranger that dwelleth with you shall be unto you as one born among you, and thou shalt love him as thyself; for ye were strangers in the land of Egypt: I am the Lord your God.
